```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
cGAS_expression <- read_excel("cGAS expression.xlsx")
CGAS_mutations <- read_excel("CGAS mutations.xlsx")
sample_info <- read_excel("sample_info.xlsx")
cGAS_copynumber <- read_excel("cGAS_copynumber.xlsx")
```

```{r dataset, include=FALSE}
cGAS_data <- cGAS_expression %>%
  inner_join(cGAS_copynumber) %>%
  inner_join(sample_info) %>%
  anti_join(CGAS_mutations)
```

## Plots

```{r plot}
ggplot(cGAS_data, aes(x = CGAS_express, y = CGAS_copy, color = lineage)) +
  geom_point()
```
